# humanstxt.org/
# The humans responsible & technology colophon

# TEAM

    Team? Excuse me? This is a solo venture bro. All Willie Vogel, all the time. It's becuz I am strong. I am able to do the tasks of 50 humans. I'm like Dr. John Thackery, minus the cocaine addiction.

# THANKS

    No one. The only person I can thank is myself becuz I am so cool n such. I'm still empathetic tho. How is your day?

# TECHNOLOGY COLOPHON

    CSS3, HTML5
